entry.title: Thursday night: A few clouds. Low minus 24.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 24. Wind chill minus 22 this evening and minus 32 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 2:00 PM MDT Thursday 13 April 2023
